name: Heart Necklace With Gem and Ribbon Tie
description: This beautiful item is a Hand baked necklace hand painted in acrylic paints, therefore each item I sell is genuinely unique. This heart is a beautiful piece as it features white ribbon as the chain, a red acrylic paint and a clear gem on the side feature. It also features layers of varnish to ensure this product lasts you for years! This is a lovely piece to have and I hope you like it as much as I do!
